About Casa

Brief

Casa UTD is a community team founded in Bundung Borehole, Serrekunda, The Gambia in the year 2009. The team consist of 26 skillfull and active players and is regarded as one of the most outstanding in the Serrekunda Central Area. The team has for the past won many trophies and played many finals getting awards as well. The team is also called 'Khale yu hew' which means 'The famous kids'.
